thread.title: Sales Promoter Required

author: ideas91fzcollc
title: Sales Promoter Required
text:
Listed: February 23, 2017 11:47 am Expires: 24 days, 23 hours Description 
Urgently Needed Filipina’s/Sri Lankans/Indians/Pakistani/Nepali Ladies 
• Good communication skills (English, Hindi, Malayam, Urdu) • With pleasing personality • Can be able to assign to any Location of UAE. • Has a sales experience in a Home Appliances/Lighhousehold • Can be able to submit the sales report on time to the Sales Manager. • Customer focus • Ability to delegate; team working, motivational and leadership skills 
send your CV: sales.promoter@yandex.com
